types.html:
jusqu'au sang

  1. hard enough to draw blood, until you draw blood
    mordre jusqu'au sang, fouetter jusqu'au sang ― to bite hard enough to draw blood, to whip until you draw blood
trans: hard enough to draw blood, until you draw blood
hard enough to draw blood, until you draw blood
